query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'meetings' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'fullTranscript';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2U3q1dt8GKGPLLB.root --database WN9ut9YEufdDjevBezkAVQ --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'meetings' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'fullTranscript';
